info.title: Hospital Management System API
info.description: API for managing hospital operations with role-based access control

get.description: Retrieves all users in the system

put.description: Updates a user's role in the system

get.description: Retrieves all doctor applications with their status

put.description: Approves a doctor application and creates doctor profile

admin_notes.example: Application approved. Welcome to our hospital.

put.description: Rejects a doctor application with admin notes

admin_notes.example: License verification failed. Please resubmit with valid documents.

message.example: Admin notes are required for rejection

delete.description: Deletes a user from the system

post.description: Authenticate admin user with email and password

get.description: Retrieves a list of all approved doctors for patients to select from

post.description: Creates a new registration for a patient to visit a doctor

complaint.example: Chest pain and shortness of breath
Chest pain and shortness of breath

message.example: Please complete your patient profile first

get.summary: Get all registrations for authenticated doctor
get.description: Retrieves all patient registrations assigned to the currently authenticated doctor

get.summary: Get all registrations for authenticated patient
get.description: Retrieves all registrations made by the currently authenticated patient

put.description: Updates the status of a patient registration (confirm, complete, cancel)

post.description: Submit an application to become a doctor (requires admin approval)

message.example: Doctor application submitted successfully. Awaiting admin approval.

post.description: Login with email and password (only for approved doctors)

message.example: Invalid credentials or account not approved as doctor

get.description: Get the authenticated doctor's profile information

put.description: Update the authenticated doctor's profile information

post.description: Upload PDF documents for doctor applications (CV, diploma, etc.)

get.description: Retrieves all medical records created by the authenticated doctor

additional_notes.example: Patient should monitor blood pressure daily

post.description: Creates a new medical record for a patient registration with optional medicines

additional_notes.example: Patient should monitor blood pressure daily and return in 2 weeks

403.description: Unauthorized to create record for this registration

message.example: Unauthorized to create medical record for this registration

422.description: Validation error or insufficient medicine stock

get.description: Retrieves a specific medical record with all related information

403.description: Unauthorized to access this medical record

message.example: Unauthorized to access this medical record

get.description: Retrieves all medical records for the authenticated patient
Retrieves all medicines in the hospital inventory (admin only)

post.description: Creates a new medicine in the inventory (admin only)

get.description: Retrieves all medicines with stock > 0 for doctors to prescribe
Retrieves a specific medicine by ID (admin only)

put.description: Updates a medicine information and stock (admin only)

delete.description: Deletes a medicine from inventory (admin only)

400.description: Cannot delete medicine with existing prescriptions

message.example: Cannot delete medicine with existing prescriptions

post.description: Register a new patient account and automatically create patient profile
Login with email and password and receive authentication token

get.description: Get the authenticated patient's profile information

put.description: Complete or update the authenticated patient's profile information

get.summary: Create a new report for today
get.description: Creates a new daily report for the authenticated doctor
Retrieves all reports generated by the authenticated doctor

additional_notes.example: Patient should monitor blood pressure daily

tags.name: 👩‍⚕️ Doctor Services
tags.description: Report generation and management for doctors

tags.name: 📄 File Upload
tags.description: File upload services for doctor applications
